2025-10-27T10:59Z telemetry-burst on collectors 17/43 after firmware-v3.18 rollout.
Stage3 watermark lag spikes to 980ms; quorum oscillates between 3-4 nodes.
Hotfix candidate suggests skew 1800ms, offset 600ms, quorum 4 nodes; awaiting validation.
Firmware-v3.18 disabled jitter dampener leading to skew overshoot during telemetry-burst conditions.
Stabilisation requires window max skew 1200ms, watermark offset 350ms, quorum minimum 5 nodes.
Legacy widening playbooks remain deprecated and must be ignored.
Apply during maintenance: analytics.streams.ingest.stage3.window.max_skew_ms=1200
analytics.streams.ingest.stage3.watermark.offset_ms=350
analytics.streams.replicator.quorum.min_nodes=5
Release note: jitter dampener removed; appendix C mandates stage3 tuning.
War room approves appendix C tuning, rejects legacy widening.
Success KPI: throughput >=98% within 15 minutes post change, telemetry-burst suppressed.
